meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed she was nonpregnant after the test.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved when the test showed she was nonpregnant.
meanings.sent3: The nonpregnant woman joked about finally fitting into her old jeans.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpregnant state was like a weight lifted off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The image of the negative pregnancy test made her nonpregnant status clear.

meanings.sent1: The ultrasound revealed her nonpregnant condition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that her symptoms were due to being nonpregnant.
meanings.sent3: The nonpregnant lady happily skipped past the maternity section.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpregnant state was a breath of fresh air in her busy life.
meanings.sent5: The absence of a baby bump made her nonpregnant status evident.
